title: Morde Riot survey
body:
Just took a Riot survey about Morde and Prestige skins, from what i took away from it.
 He may get a new skin after several years without but it would most likely be of a Superior quality only. Frankly i would be extremely disappointed if that is the Case.

After years of  neglect i kinda hope for more.

I could be wrong, but i have become a pessimist  due to Years of mistreatment of my Favorite character.

replies.body: Keep your expectations low and you'll never be disappointed {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I have kept them low  and have still been dissapointed
I agree. Same thing happened with Karma. I just gave up on her for the most part. Hopefully you don't have to for Morde.
It would be Mind shattering if they made a rework worse than CertainlyT's.   I dont believe its possible.
I definitely agree, but one positive is that they atleast admitted it was trash. Karma never even got that. Also they have relatively quickly decided to give it another shot.

2 years of hell  feels a lot longer than you would think.  

To be fair when you rework a champion and less than half of its playerbase remains after including an influx of new players.

You cant view that as anything less than a failure.
 They apologized sure but lip service  doesn't  change the feeling of abandonment.

I just hope Mordekaiser isn't the new Irelia, where they come out and are extremely fun but people quickly realize the champ is fundamentally broken then they get nerfed over and over. It's happened so often the last couple years that I basically pessimistically expect champions to not be fun a few months after they release. Let's hope we get more of a Neeko than an Akali is what I'm saying.
